import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-nav', templateUrl: './user-nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-nav.component.css'] }) export class UserNavComponent { constructor(private router:Router){ } goToCreatePost(){ this.router.navigateByUrl('/new') } }
